title: Slumber Party Trilogy
description: The Slumber Party series details the sleeping love that no less than six beautiful young women are persuaded into with none other than the lucky Mr. Banner having his way with them over and over again. Gymnasts, cheerleaders, twins, beach volleyballers, all of them are proud to represent their institution of learning, and Mr. Banner is happy to take advantage of their academic and sporting aspirations for his own pleasure. With expert and unbiased counselling from the now-qualified psychologist, Ava Banner, everybody gets their happy ending.
author: Scarlett Skyes
